title: Application of Definitions
fullText:
Throughout this Standard, the definitions of terms given in Clauses 1.4.2 to 1.4.134 apply. Where an additional term is defined in a particular section or clause, the term has the meaning defined there.
The definitions apply to both parts of this Standard.
â€¢ Exception: Where the context otherwise requires, or the word or term is not specifically defined, the commonly understood meaning applies. Where the terms voltage and current are used without further qualification, they imply r.m.s. values.
